comment: Made an A for SCI 1101 and made another A in this class. She is literally one of the easiest professors I've had in college. All the reviews saying she is hard are from idiots, as you honestly have to be an idiot to not make an A. She drops the lowest test grade and 2 lowest MES Activities. Easy class, take her for an easy A.

She's not a horrible person, but her teaching skills are not the best. The tests don't follow the book nor the power points that she reads straight off of as a lecture. attendance isn't mandatory, but she will give in class assignments. I only did decent bc my classmates made a groupme which was the best thing to come from this class.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: DO NOT TAKE THIS PROFESSOR. This is the most horrible class. She can't teach. She lectures straight from the powerpoint, but her exams do not come from her lectures (or the book). I am a straight A student, and this class was difficult for me. The wording on the test is confusing and she is no help. I cannot stress this enough, she can NOT teach.

She's pretty nice, but theres nothing really special about her from a teaching stand point. The tests are hard and there's homework every week. I suggest you read the chapter before the test, don't just read the notes.

The way she taught it, it seemed like anyone could teach science at the college level. She just read straight from the powerpoints. The class was overall easy, but with the online lab components, it got challenging. You don't really need the book, as you can Google a lot of the answers. The book can pretty much guarantee an A though.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Drops lowest test grade, 2 lowest quiz grades and 2 lowest MES activities. Study hard for the tests bc they have a lot of information but if you study you'll be fine. MES activities are stupid bc the answers don't match up to the book but she drops the two lowest. Gives extra credit - got 10 bonus points on final - extra credit helps a ton

At first I really struggled in her class because the lectures are difficult to grasp. I was hard studying for the tests, but DO NOT DROP THIS CLASS. She will help you out tremendously towards the end of the semester with extra credit opportunities and an easy final! (Science is my worst and I did good)
rating_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--EXTRA CREDIT--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Her lectures have little to do with the tests. You won't do well on her tests unless you teach yourself. I attended every class but I only did well on tests if I taught myself. She makes it way harder than it needs to be. If you aren't an actual science major, take an easier professor to boost your GPA.

Gives lab quizzes each week, so if you go to class and take the quiz then you will do fine on quizzes, but the online quizzes over the book are more difficult. Have to have an access code to use the online quizzes, but otherwise, the book in unnecessary. Exams are hard and she does not review a lot. Gives extra credit
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Attendance is not mandatory, but the way she gets you is with the lab quizzes. You do an online lab the week before and the quiz is on one of the two days you go to her class. It just depends on what day. Read her power points and try to pay attention in class and you'll do fine on the tests.
Professor Rajkumar was not a bad teacher at all. At first i really didn't like her because of the long boring lectures she gave, but she grew on me. She makes jokes and is actually pretty funny.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Horrible professor. Her lectures can easily bore you to sleep. She reads directly off the power point. Don't get the book you won't open once.
If you do the online lab component then you will pass the weekly quizzes and if you show up to lectures then you pass the tests. Easy A

She was a very cool, down to earth teacher. She lectures a ton and if you listen to those lectures/power points (that she puts on D2L) then you'll be good for the tests. Also, she gave a ton of extra credit. Easy A.
Good class. Do the power points and you wont be disappointed.
